title: Darkrock Victorian Steampunk Edwardian Western Brocade Silver Black Gothic Men's Vest
description: Men's Vest Waistcoat Damask Velvet Gothic Steampunk Aristocrat VTG/Brocade Vest Premium Designer Men's Sleeveless Vest Waistcoat Damask Velvet Goth Steampunk VTG Polyester,great Victorian Style pattern.2 Front Pocket with black velvet leather,Has nice Cut from back,adjustable back straps,it has Damask printed pattern on the Vest, Great Quality Gothic Style Vest,How to Measure your Chest size Please use a Flat surface,put any garment on that flat surface,Measure armpit to armpit and then multiply this figure to times 2(meaning double that ),So if its measure 22" inches so its means 42" ,so that is makes your chest size Large,if you like more room in your Vest,Please order one size bigger. Small: Chest- 38". Medium: Chest- 40". Large: Chest- 43". X-Large: Chest- 46". 2XL: Chest- 49". 3XL: Chest 53" 4XL :Chest 57",5XL:Chest :61" .The size is normally US sizes So we recommend you to double check size measurement in each product description comparing with your clothes. If you haven't tried our goods before, we suggest you to pick 1 size bigger items.
